Lore: Loyal Wookiee companion of Captain Han Solo. Co-pilot of the \ul Millennium Falcon\ul0. Leia referred to him as a "walking carpet."
Gametext: Must deploy on Hoth, but may move elsewhere. May not be deployed if three or more of opponent's unique (*) characters on table.
Information: Bossk and Zuckuss may reduce Chewbacca's forfeit to zero while present.\par -----\par Chewbacca personas are:\par \par [Han, Chewie, And The Falcon]\par [Han, Chewie, And The Falcon (V)]\par Chewbacca\par Chewbacca (V)\par Chewbacca Of Kashyyyk\par Chewbacca Of Kashyyyk (V)\par Chewbacca, Protector\par Chewbacca, Protector (V)\par Chewbacca, Walking Carpet (V)\par Chewie With Blaster Rifle\par Chewie\par Chewie (V)\par Chewie, Enraged\par Chewie, Enraged (V)
IsPulled: General Dodonna (V2)\par Life Debt\par Seeking An Audience (V6)\par Wookiee Roar
Matching: Chewie's AT-ST\par Chewie's AT-ST (V9)\par Millennium Falcon\par Millennium Falcon (V14)

Gametext: If you control, Force drain +1 here.   Your Imperials and combat vehicles are deploy -1 here.
LightSideText: If you control, Force drain +1 here.
DarkSideText: Your Imperials and combat vehicles are deploy -1 here.

Lore: Four-legged, \b enclosed\b0  combat vehicle. The monstrous, plodding AT-AT (All Terrain Armored Transport) can carry an entire squadron of armed troops.
Gametext: May add 1 pilot and 8 passengers. Permanent pilot aboard provides ability of 1.
Information: Imperials and combat vehicles are deploy -1 at Hoth: Mountains.
IsPulled: Battle Deployment\par Field Promotion (V5)\par Hoth: Ice Plains (V6)\par Walker Garrison

Lore: The pilots at the Rebel Base on Hoth are trained to respond quickly to the Empire's forces. Many Rebels feel that they could take on the whole Empire themselves.
Gametext: If one of your pilots is at an exterior Hoth site, use 2 Force to search your Reserve Deck and take one T-47 into hand. OR If your piloted T-47 is defending a battle alone at a site, add one battle destiny.
Information: Learn About The Force, Luke (V15) makes Lone Rogue a Used Interrupt, but if played during battle you draw no more than two battle destiny.\par -----\par T-47 are:\par \par Rebel Snowspeeder\par Rogue 1\par Rogue 2\par Rogue 3\par Rogue 4\par Dash In Rogue 10 (V6)\par Sandspeeder\par Snowspeeder\par Snowspeeder Garrison (V6)
Pulls: Rebel Snowspeeder\par Rogue 1\par Rogue 2\par Rogue 3\par Rogue 4\par Dash In Rogue 10 (V6)\par Sandspeeder\par Snowspeeder\par Snowspeeder Garrison (V6)
IsPulled: Commander Luke Skywalker (V4)\par Echo Base Garrison

Lore: Technicians at the Rebel Base on Hoth modified T-47 airspeeders to fly in the frigid atmosphere of the ice planet. \b Enclosed\b0.
Gametext: May add 1 pilot or passenger. Permanent pilot aboard provides ability of 1.
IsPulled: Combined Fleet Action\par Commander Luke Skywalker (V4)\par Lone Rogue

Lore: General of the AT-AT assault armor division sent by Darth Vader to crush the Rebellion on Hoth. Cold and ruthless.
Gametext: Must deploy on Hoth, but may move elsewhere. May not be deployed if three or more of opponent's unique (*) characters on table. Snowtroopers at same site are forfeit +1.
Information: Veers personas are:\par \par General Veers\par General Veers (V4)\par Veers\par Veers (V10)\par -----\par Imperial Council Members are:\par \par Colonel Wullf Yularen (V12)\par Janus Greejatus\par Janus Greejatus (V12)\par Officer Evax (V12)\par Sim Aloo\par Sim Aloo (V11)\par \par There Is No Try & Oppressive Enforcement (V12) makes Emperor, admirals, generals, and moffs Imperial Council Members and influence +1.
IsPulled: Blizzard 4\par Blizzard 4 (V6)\par Commander Daine Jir (V6)\par Endor Shield (V11)\par Imperial Command\par Tarkin (V3)

Lore: When efficiently deployed, a squadron of AT-ATs can quickly take control of a wide area, making it easy for Imperial forces to dominate a planet.
Gametext: If Veers is at an exterior Hoth site, use 2 Force to search your Reserve Deck and take one AT-AT into your hand. Shuffle, cut, and replace. OR If you have 3 AT-ATs at three different Hoth sites, your Force drains are +2 at Hoth locations this turn.
Information: Light Side Ortolan adds 1 to number of Hoth sites required to gain a Force drain bonus from Walker Garrison.
Pulls: One AT-AT.\par Blizzard 1\par Blizzard 1 (V)\par Blizzard 2\par Blizzard 2 (V)\par Blizzard 4\par Blizzard 4 (V)\par Blizzard Walker\par Cyclone 1 (V)\par Cyclone Walker (V)\par Dune Walker\par Imperial Walker\par Marquand In Blizzard 6 (V)\par Tempest 1
IsPulled: You May Start Your Landing\par You May Start Your Landing (V)
